title: Why Stormrazor Is Good On New Aatrox (And Funny One Shot Build)
body:
So as we all know stormrazor takes about 1 second to proc, given his Q animation time and before animation delay, u can crit every time u do this, or just go one shot aatrox which build looks like: {{item:3147}} {{item:3095}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3748}} {{item:3022}} {{item:1001}} 

Actually for this one shot build u might not even need boots, maybe even a rapid fire canon would work tbh, this build honestly works bc of his 16% hp damage passive, it could take on tanks, adcs, and so much more 

Just remember if you will build as trolly as that ^^ just remember to use R + E + auto before u do the one shot (R and E give damage increases LOL) so yea gl testing that out! (tank assasin basically)

EDIT: Holy shit this build is awesome, totally recommend new aatrox build for sure mhm mhm
